channel.title: Requested operation is not valid: network 'external' is not active
channel.description: Hello, forgive my ignorance as I'm still somewhat new to linux. But I'm trying to install Whonix 15 on KVM. I followed all the instructions here on in docs, but when I try to start the gateway, it says "Requested operation is not valid: network 'external' is not active". I'm not sure if it's in KVM itself or if I set something up wrong. Please help. Any ideas? Thank you.

item.title: Requested operation is not valid: network 'external' is not active
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
We’ve recently changed the Whonix network names to be more clear. Please remove the old ones ‘internal’ and ‘external’ and follow this post:

http://forums.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/t/important-whonix-kvm-network-settings-changes/7269

Read full topic
item.source: Requested operation is not valid: network 'external' is not active

item.title: Requested operation is not valid: network 'external' is not active
item.dc:creator: David888
item.description:
Hello, forgive my ignorance as I’m still somewhat new to linux. But I’m trying to install Whonix 15 on KVM. I followed all the instructions here on in docs, but when I try to start the gateway, it says “Requested operation is not valid: network ‘external’ is not active”. I’m not sure if it’s in KVM itself or if I set something up wrong. Please help. Any ideas? Thank you.
